A transmission echoes through the airwaves and ripples through the static of
comm. systems and energon interference, able to be heard by any comm. tuned
to any broadband frequency on the planet. �Attention all Cybertronians. This
is the merchant ship, Vulture, of the weapons dealership Pinch Incorporated.
We have taken notice of your recant activities and wish to offer our
services. We have landed on a small island in the area which is the closest
approximation to the middle of your two territories as we were able to
locate � we wish to offer free trade to any faction, group, or army who
wishes to engage in free trade with us, and are willing to hear offers for
the purchase, sale, manufacturing, repair, or upgrade of nearly any weapon
in existence. Our location is 39�32�� North, by 31�12�� West. Hail on open
frequency before reaching 15.4 miles of the larger of the two islands and
the Electro Nuclear Magnetic Pulse Defense Field around our neutral zone of
trade will be temporarily opened to you. Thank you, and we hope to do
business with you soon.� The Transmission ends.
